titles.title: Demographic controls of future global fire risk

custom_metadata.assertion: In the version of this Letter originally published, in Figure 1 the labels 'Climate only' and 'Climate and CO 2 ' were assigned the incorrect colours; this has been changed so that the former is now represented by a blue line and the latter by a green line. This has been corrected in all versions of this Letter.
The authors declare no competing financial interests.
